@emiiilyt And hey, Iâ€™m all for being smart with using the resources one has in a purposeful way. Hoping they do more for you guys too. Once a year isnâ€™t enough to show appreciation for staff.

@emiiilyt Yes. Corporate memberships allow them to use the venue mostly for â€œbusiness networkingâ€ (fun with business colleagues/lunches/drinks) on the company dime 99% of the time. To save resources on events requiring actual effort, theyâ€™ll hold staff events there other 1% of the time.

@emiiilyt They count on the fact that you guys probably donâ€™t get out much as far as work-sponsored events go. Literally anything is better than a boardroom, which is kinda minimum. I think they can do better.

@emiiilyt Itâ€™s a staff event, no? Tell me your â€œleadersâ€ put some considered and inclusive thought into what ALL of you would like to do/places to go which appealed to as many of you as possible and Iâ€™ll take back what I said :)
